name: tlx
description: Like JSX but uses JavaScript Template Literals - No Preprocessor Required

scripts.prepare: cp ./src/*.js ./browser/ && browserify index.js -o browser/tlx.js && uglifyjs browser/tlx.js -o browser/tlx.min.js && uglifyjs src/tlx-core.js -o browser/tlx-core.min.js && uglifyjs src/tlx-render.js -o browser/tlx-render.min.js && uglifyjs src/tlx-reactive.js -o browser/tlx-reactive.min.js && uglifyjs src/tlx-directives.js -o browser/tlx-directives.min.js

author: Simon Y. Blackwell <syblackwell@anywhichway.com> (http://www.github.com/anywhichway)
